name: Fit for a Queen Turban
description:
If you want to step out like an super fly fashionista and rock the hottest trend in hair accessories, then this turban is definitely for you! 

Turbans are hot and have been seen all over the runway in fashion week.

Why not store your tresses underneath this gorgeous one-size fits all bold print turban? 

The turban is made from a sleek jersey material that wont pull on your hair. Slip it on and off! It's very versatile and can be styled to your liking!
